T02TD2342E:2a-1: tatny'a sva bh'a ba dri shti g'i ti ka do ha n'a ma /
T02TD2342E:2a-3: rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2342E:2a-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2342E:2a-5: gnyis med bdud rtsi kun 'dus grub thob kyi //
T02TD2342E:2a-6: dri med dgongs pa lta spyod la sogs ni //
T02TD2342E:2a-7: nyams len thabs de kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2342E:2a-8: bde gshegs rnams la phyag 'tshal bshad par bya //
T02TD2342E:2a-9: dngos po yang ni ma yin zhing //
T02TD2342E:2a-10: dngos med la ni ma skyes pa'i //
T02TD2342E:2a-11: 'di lta bu yi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2342E:2a-12: su zhig gis ni rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD2342E:2a-13: l'u yi pa ni smra bar byed //
T02TD2342E:2a-14: 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che// khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang //
T02TD2342E:2a-15: de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med //
T02TD2342E:2a-16: de yi kha dog rigs dang ni //
T02TD2342E:2a-17: dbyibs kyang bdag gis rtogs pa med //
T02TD2342E:2a-18: de lta bu yi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2342E:2a-19: dngos por ma grub ji ltar bstan //
T02TD2342E:2a-20: l'u yi ba ni smra bar byed //
T02TD2342E:2a-21: 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2342E:2a-22: khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang //
T02TD2342E:2a-23: de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med //
T02TD2342E:2a-24: bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri //
T02TD2342E:2b-0: chu gting zla ba'i gzugs @2b brnyan ni //
T02TD2342E:2b-1: don dam sgyu mar rtogs pa med //
T02TD2342E:2b-2: l'u yi pa ni smra bar byed //
T02TD2342E:2b-3: 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che //
T02TD2342E:2b-4: khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang //
T02TD2342E:2b-5: de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med //
T02TD2342E:2b-6: l'u yi pa ni smra bar byed //
T02TD2342E:2b-7: bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri //
T02TD2342E:2b-8: de yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med //
T02TD2342E:2b-9: rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon l'u yi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
